sentences.en: All men have their respective duties.
Analysis and recommendations are presented in various problem areas by respective experts.
sentences.cn: 专家各自对不同的问题作了分析和研究.

sentences.en: He and I are each going to visit our respective teachers.
sentences.cn: 我和他分别要去拜访各自的老师.

sentences.en: It is important that we dovetail our respective interests.
sentences.cn: 让我们各自的利益相吻合很重要。

sentences.en: Next, labor both mutual map concerns, advanced the point of respective characteristic.
sentences.cn: 然后, 详细分析了两者的相互映射关系, 并提出了各自的特色之处.

sentences.en: Steve and I were at very different stages in our respective careers.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫和我在各自的职业生涯中处于迥然不同的阶段。

sentences.en: The children, following the gentes of their respective mothers, would be divided between them.
sentences.cn: 子女们各随其母亲而分属于这两个氏族.

sentences.en: The happy couple and their respective parents took to the floor.
sentences.cn: 这对幸福的新人和他们各自的父母在舞池中翩翩起舞。

sentences.en: The Ministers have overall responsibility for the respective ministries or commissions under their charge.
sentences.cn: 各部、各委员会实行部长、主任负责制.

sentences.en: the respective roles of teachers and students
sentences.cn: 教师和学生各自不同的角色

sentences.en: The three methods described above have their respective merits.
sentences.cn: 上述的三个方法都有它们各自的优点.

sentences.en: There is an argument to express them in ground level abundance of the respective elements.
sentences.cn: 有理由把它们用相应元素的地平丰度来表示.

sentences.en: They are each recognized specialists in their respective fields.
sentences.cn: 他们在各自的领域都被视为专家。

sentences.en: They went into their respective bedrooms to pack.
sentences.cn: 他们回到各自的卧室打包。

sentences.en: We all went back to our respective homes to wait for news.
sentences.cn: 我们都各自回家等待消息。

sentences.en: We cannot remove our respective sections from each other, nor build an impassable wall between them.
sentences.cn: 我们不能把我们各区彼此搬迁, 也不能在他们中间建起无法逾越的长城.

sentences.en: When the lift reaches the fourth floor they go to their respective offices.
sentences.cn: 电梯开到五楼,他们走进了各自的办公室.

trans.tran_en: used before a plural noun to refer to the different things that belong to each separate person or thing mentioned
